programme.title: Baba Almajal
programme.desc: Zain; a mechanic struggles to live an honest life with his mother, his fiance and her siblings. His mother hides the fact that his father is still alive, but the secret she has kept for so long threatens Zain's life and turns it upside down.

programme.title: Wiladah Min Al-Khasira
programme.desc: Presenting the social differences between the upper and lower classes and the problems that arise from them, through highlighting the contradictions experienced by prominent figures, as well as the dangers that young people face in life, in addition to displaying the problems of state employees.

programme.desc: Male Nurse Greg Focker, who wants to commit to his girlfriend, Pam. Greg is shocked to learn that her father is conservative, and that he has to get his approval first. programme.title: Selimo we Harimo
programme.desc: Selimo is a struggling screenwriter who believes in horoscopes. As he spends his time searching for a life partner who fits the characteristics of his sign, he is exposed to various funny situations.

programme.title: Al Sadeeqat
programme.desc: A businesswoman seeks to exploit some girls to achieve her personal interests by having them work as dancers and forcing them to do whatever she asks, whatever it is, and the stories of these women come across each other.

programme.title: Subar famyly
programme.desc: Three different families, Rashid, Fakhry and Wadih are brought together by intertwining social relations, but social problems and flaws divide them and make their lives full of comedic situations and secrets.

programme.title: Wa'datuni Ya Rafiqi
programme.desc: A comedy that follows a group of childhood friends who have vowed to get married on the same day. Years pass, and when one of them mentions he is about to get married, they renew their vow and agree to have a group wedding.

programme.title: Haret El Asil
programme.desc: The storyteller Abu Hamdi is released from prison, after ten years in which he was unjustly behind bars, for insufficient evidence for committing the crime. As he comes out a broken man because of the insistence of his sister, Nazmia, that he was the one who killed her husband.

programme.title: Fee Hadrat al-Gheiab
programme.desc: A biography about the late Palestinian poet Mahmoud Darwish, who is considered one of the most important poets in the Arab world.

programme.title: Shouq
programme.desc: With the Syrian war as a backdrop, the series tells the story of Shouq, whose memories keep deteriorating, and Rose, who gets abducted by an extremist terrorist group that make her a concubine, as her husband Wa'el does everything in his power to find her.

programme.title: Al Mizan
programme.desc: A suspenseful thriller about what goes on behind the scenes of criminal activities, court and lawyers, with an unexpected twist at the peak.

programme.title: Sanie Al-ahlam
programme.desc: A Sci-Fi thriller about physicist Sami Omran (Maxim Khalil) who finds a way to influence peoples dreams, and even create any dream he wants inside a persons head.

programme.title: Udaariyaan
programme.desc: Sandhu's family comes from a small village in Punjab; however, as the daughter Jasmine dreams of immigrating to Canada, the dreams of the two sisters Tejo and Jasmine soon change when fate brings them a different reality.

programme.title: Mohamed Ali Road 2
programme.desc: Everyone in town thinks that everything has become calm after the death of Shipmaster Abu Shehab (Shehab's father) and Abdel Wahab. Mashary tries to control things with Kamal, but the appearance of Yassin turns things upside down, and he becomes the real ruler.

programme.title: Aaelat Abdel Hamid Hafez
programme.desc: Memories dominate Abdel Hamids life, especially as he recalls when he was a student how much he loved Abdel Halim Hafezs voice which echoes in every corner of his house. As Abdel Hamid deals with the burdens of his family, he decides to make a fateful decision that shocks everyone.

programme.title: Dayman Amer
programme.desc: Amer impersonates an educational doctor to enter the Vision School and work there after he plans this with his friend Lotfi, the secretary of the school manager, Zahra. While he succeeds in gaining the trust and love of the people around him, he hides something from everyone

programme.title: Sali Mali
programme.desc: Mae Tomos Caradog yn rhy fach i neud lot o bethe, ond mae o'r maint perffaith i gyrraedd ds sy'n mynd ar goll. Tomos Caradog is too small to do many things but is perfect for some things!

programme.title: Jambori
programme.desc: Ymunwch Jam ar daith llawn synau, cerddoriaeth a lluniau - bydd cysgodion yn dawnsio a robotiaid yn chwarae! Join Jam on a musical adventure full of interesting sounds and pictures!

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: Beth ydi'r cerflun anhygoel sydd wedi ymddangos o nunlle yng Ngwyl Gerfio Eira Porth yr Haul? A fantastic sculpture has appeared from nowhere in Porth yr Haul's Ice Carving Festival.

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae Betsi a'r Newidliwiwr yn troi Digbi'n goch fel ei arwr Gruffudd Goch yn y gobaith y bydd yn medru hedfan. Betsi and her Spectrumorph turn Digbi red like his hero Gruffudd Goch.

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci yn l gyda mwy o sgetsys dwl a doniol! Cacamwnci is back, with Iestyn Ymestyn, Tesni Trwsio Pobeth, Dani Rheolaeth, Plismon Preis, Vanessa drws nesa and Delyth Dylwythen.

programme.title: Shwshaswyn
programme.desc: Mae'n heulog ar y traeth heddiw, a phawb angen oeri ychydig. It's sunny on the beach today, and everyone needs to cool off somewhat.

programme.title: New: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos and friends.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Bydd y daith hon yn ymweld a chyfandiroedd Affrica ac Asia er mwyn i ni ddod i nabod y Gnw a'r Madfall. This time the journey takes us to Africa and Asia to meet the Gnu and the Lizard.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae Mabli yn gwahodd ei ffrindiau i chwarae gwesty yn ei thy! When she forgets to listen to her guests' needs, Mabli's Hotel doesn't go quite as she'd hoped.

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Meleri yn ymweld gardd Ysgol Pendalar, bydd Evan ac Idris yn mynd ar daith ystlumod yn y nos, a bydd Huw yn nofio yn y mor gyda Jac. More adventures in the open air.

programme.title: Cywion Bach
programme.desc: Cawn drip i ganolfan pili-palod sy'n gyfle gwych i weld pili pala go iawn - ac yn help i'r Cywion ddysgu mwy am y gair 'pili-pala'. A trip to the Butterfly Centre and the word 'pili-pala'.

programme.title: Sam Tn
programme.desc: Mae Norman am greu'r syrcas 'fwyaf anghredadwy' erioed, ond fel arfer mae'n rhaid i Sam gamu mewn. Norman creates the 'most unbelievable' circus ever, but as usual it's Sam to the rescue!

programme.title: Dathlu 'Da Dona
programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Nia yn cael parti merlota gyda Megan o Gwdihw. Today, Nia will be having a riding party with Megan from Gwdihw.

programme.title: Stiw
programme.desc: Mae Stiw'n dysgu nad pethau newydd ydy'r pethau gorau bob amser, wrth i hen feicTaid fynd yn gyflymach na beic newydd sbon Elsi. Stiw learns that new things aren't always better than old.

programme.title: Y Diwrnod Mawr
programme.desc: Dathliad Eid al Fitr fydd diwrnod mawr Jaleel ac mae'n astudio Arabeg, mynd i'r mosg ac agor ffenestri ei galendr Ramadan i baratoi. Jaleel's big day will be the Eid al Fitr celebration.

programme.title: Blociau Rhif
programme.desc: Hwyl a sbri i blant ifanc gyda'r blociau rhif. Fun and games for young children with the number blocks.

programme.title: Ben a Mali a'u byd bach o hud
programme.desc: Mae pawb yn ymweld chastell y Brenin a Brenhines Aur. Everyone visits King and Queen Marigold at their castle.

programme.title: Ben a Mali a'u Byd Bach Hud
Caru Canu a Stori
programme.desc: Stori am aderyn sy'n dod o hyd i wy ychwanegol yn ei nyth sydd gan Cari i ni heddiw. Today, Cari has a story about a bird that finds an extra egg in its nest.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Mae gan Pablo ei ffordd ei hun o weld y byd. Heddiw dyw e ddim yn deall pam fod ei fol yn gwneud synau od. Pablo's tummy is making odd noises. Noa thinks he might have swallowed a radio!

programme.title: Ahoi!
programme.desc: Pwy fydd y mr-ladron sy'n ymuno Ben Dant a Cadi i herio'r byd y tro 'ma? From which school will these pirates come, to join Ben Dant and Cadi for a little adventure?

programme.title: Sali Mali
programme.desc: Mae Jac Do yn chwarae tric ar ei ffrindiau trwy guddio dan het bwgan brain, ond mae ei ffrindiau'n cael y gorau arno. Jac Do plays a trick on his friends by hiding under a scarecrow's hat.

programme.title: Jambori
programme.desc: Ymunwch Jam ar daith llawn synau, cerddoriaeth a lluniau lliwgar. Bydd cysgodion yn dawnsio a robotiaid yn chwarae! Join Jam on a musical adventure, with interesting sounds and pictures!

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: Mae Mr Parri yn penderfynu bod cludo bwyd yn y fan i bobl yn llawer rhy araf, felly mae ganddo drns i wneud y gwaith. Mr Parri has decided to use drones to deliver food to his customers!

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae 'na gyffro tan gwyllt yn y gyfres animeiddio hon i blant meithrin am ddraig fach o'r enw Digbi. Animation for youngsters about a dragon called Digbi - this time, fireworks fun!

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci yn l gyda mwy o sgetsys dwl a doniol! Fun with characters like Iestyn Ymestyn, Tesni Trwsio Pobeth, Dani Rheolaeth, Plismon Preis, Vanessa drws nesa and Delyth Dylwythen.

programme.title: Shwshaswyn
programme.desc: Mae Fflwff yn darganfod sgarff i'r Capten gael cogio morio arni, ac mae gan Seren br o fenyg arbennig iawn. Fflwff finds a scarf so the Captain can pretend to be on the high seas.

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos and friends.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Dewch ar antur gyda ni i gwrdd ag anifeiliaid bach y byd. Y tro hwn yr Hwyatbig a'r Loris fydd yn cael y sylw. This time it's the Platypus and the Slow Loris that get the attention.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae Mabli a'i ffrindiau yn chwilio am aderyn prin yn y goedwig! On today's adventure, Mai-Mai and her friends are on the lookout for a rare bird in the forest!
